LanguageData.RC2_BlueSky.label: blue sky
LanguageData.RC2_BlueSky.description: Closely related to Wake-up, Blue sky is a synthetic stimulant that promotes both energy and wakefulness in users. However, its a highly addictive drug that also causes extreme aggressiveness, not to mention many health problems for long-term users. It is, however, cheaper to produce than Wake-up.
